summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5869 for the improvement of 45th Avenue Northeast, from East 45th Street to East 50th Street; and from the south line of Laurelvista Addition to East 54th Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 77302, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
